title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.tldr: The Pushbullet terms of service states: "PushBullet reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace any part of this Agreement. It is your responsibility to check this Agreement periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the Service following the posting of any changes to this Agreement constitutes acceptance of those changes."
